q_en: Please release 100 units of cotton fabric from the Main warehouse.

steps.sql: UPDATE warehouse_material wm JOIN materials m ON wm.material_id = m.id JOIN warehouse w ON wm.warehouse_id = w.id SET wm.left_number = wm.left_number - 100 WHERE m.name = 'Cotton Fabric' AND w.name = 'Main Warehouse';
steps.description: Update the left_number of the 'Cotton Fabric' material in the 'Main Warehouse' by reducing it by 100 units.
